extendedInfo.description: Study in UK app is a very useful tool for international students who are looking to study in the UK or are already studying in the UK. Highlights & Features - List of all the UK Universities, UK Colleges & UK Schools listed on the UKBA Tier 4 Register of Sponsors.- Find your preferred UK instituions from major UK cities such as London, Birmingham, Manchester and Glasgow (Scotland). - Searchable list of current Tier 4 Sponsors who are HTS (Highly Trusted Sponsors), A Rating Sponsors, B Rating Sponsors and Legacy that are approved by UKBA / Homeoffice.- View the list of Scholarships available in the UK institutions and register your interest. - View the Offers & Discounts targeted for International Students from which you can save thousands of pounds.- Register your details to study at your preferred UK University/ UK College / UK School.- Order Course Information & Prospectus for 1000's of UK Institutions- Get Help & Support on Student Visa application & Student Visa Extension issues & other related matters.Get Help & Support through online, telephone, branches and social media within 12 working hours.Study in UK app is the only searchable published UKBA Tier 4 Register of Sponsors on the web. Search UK Universities, Colleges, Schools and Other Institutions who can enrol international students. The Tier 4 Register of Sponsors is a important criteria in obtaining a valid UK educational institute for your UK Student Visa Application or UK Student Visa Extension.This is free app that will facilitate you finding the right university and course for you!Download it now!

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: I can now find a good college from my mobile.
reviews.author: Bish Jaishi

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: does what it says, worked well on my samsung galaxy y duos GT-S6102
reviews.author: Pratik Shrestha

reviews.comment: useful app for international students! highly recommend!
reviews.author: Sajita Tiwari
